name: Cubical [Demo]
description:
Cubical is an unforgiving rhythm game in which you have to dodge, drag, click...

You are in control of Bob, a sweet little cube boy,  who has been teleported to an unfamiliar universe. And now, he must avoid all obstacles before him on his way to freedom.

There's no weapons. No tools.  All you have is your own hands, and sense of rhythm. Make a good use of them as you guide Bob.


  • Handmade levels - Every single obstacle has been placed manually (which is a lot of work).
  • Bosses - Tough and intimidating, wish you luck.
  • Different skins - From Bob himself to robots, there's something for everybody.
  • Achievement system - You can keep track of your stats, and be proud of yourself, or perhaps the opposite.

(More to come.)


  • A/D - left/right
  • Left/Right mouse click

(It is very likely that this list will be expanded.)

If you're having any issues installing the game, watch the video, or read the instructions below.

For Browser:

  1.  Click on the "Download Now" button.
  2.  Choose whether you want to get the game for free, or donate (donations are optional).
  3.  On the download menu, choose the version and click "Download".
  4. Unzip the .zip.
  5. Run the .exe file.

For App:

  1. Once in the app, and on the game page, navigate to the bottom left, where you'll find an "Install" button.
  2. Press the button, and select the game version and install location.
  3. Press "Launch".

(Game can be found in your itch library.)
